title: micromen
author: micromen
content: Lot 1 - [AUCTION] Bitcoin Penny 1/1 Prototype SILVER Classic Roll! 2018 (40 coins)The beauty of this box and roll is very hard to capture on cameraThere is a bit of tarnish on the most outside coins of the rollSTARTING BID: 0.01BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT: 0.001BTCEND TIME: July 24th, 2023 22:00 UTCSNIPE: Any bid made in last 15 minutes will extend the auction for that lot 15 minutes beyond the previous ending time.Excluded from Bidding: I may exclude/disqualify bidders, or require a deposit, for any bidders at my sole discretion.PAYMENT : I will post payment address in this thread after auction ends.SHIPPING: Based on location and preference. Item ships from EuropeEscrow accepted, Buyer covers escrow fees.If you have any questions or would like more pictures, please do not hesitate to ask  I am hosting this auction on behalf of the owner. I'm in full charge of the entire process and the item is in my possession. Shipping will also be handled by myself.

comments.author: rsincognito
comments.body: LOVE this item, it Is beautiful, are these coins pure silver and if so how much is the total weight of the coins together,  thank you so much. RS =)

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: Quote from: rsincognito on July 18, 2023, 09:58:39 PMLOVE this item, it Is beautiful, are these coins pure silver and if so how much is the total weight of the coins together,  thank you so much. RS =)Yes.. 0.999 silver and total weight is 10oz (1/4oz x 40)
